mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (post_title, content_id, board_id, user_id, category_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{contentId}, #{boardId}, #{writerId}, #{categoryId});
mapper.select: select post_id postId, post_title title, write_date writeDate, content_id contentId, board_id boardId, views, user_id writerId, category_id categoryId from post where post_id = #{postId}
select post_id postId, post_title title, write_date writeDate, content_id contentId, board_id boardId, views, user_id writerId, category_id categoryId from post
select post_id postId, post_title title, write_date writeDate, content_id contentId, board_id boardId, views, user_id writerId, category_id categoryId from post where user_id = #{writerId}
select post_id postId, post_title title, write_date writeDate, content_id contentId, board_id boardId, views, user_id writerId, category_id categoryId from post where board_id = #{boardId}
select post_id postId, post_title title, write_date writeDate, content_id contentId, board_id boardId, views, user_id writerId, category_id categoryId from post where category_id = #{categoryId}

select p.post_id postId, post_title title, write_date writeDate, p.content_id contentId, board_id contentId, views, p.user_id writerId, category_id categoryId, u.user_id userId, nickname, content, count(p.post_id) likes from post p join user u on p.user_id = u.user_id join content c on p.content_id = c.content_id left outer join taku.like l on p.post_id = l.post_id where p.post_id = #{postId} group by p.post_id
